auth.name: Authentication
auth.description: JWT-based authentication with refresh tokens, user management, and PostgreSQL/SQLite support
auth.author: FastAPI Blocks Registry

users.name: User Management
users.description: CRUD endpoints for user management with role-based access control
users.author: FastAPI Blocks Registry
users.notes: IMPORTANT: This module has mock authentication. To use with auth module, modify users/dependencies.py to import from app.modules.auth.dependencies. See users/dependencies.py and users/models.py for integration instructions.

logs.name: Logging System
logs.description: Comprehensive logging with database storage, error tracking decorator, search, and REST API. Supports multiple log levels, request tracing, and user activity tracking.
logs.author: FastAPI Blocks Registry
features: 5 log levels (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL)
Full-text search across message, module, function
Advanced filtering by level, user, date, module
logs.notes: Use @log_errors decorator to automatically log exceptions. The decorator extracts user_id, request_id, and log_service from function parameters. See logs/README.md for usage examples.

two_factor.name: Two-Factor Authentication
two_factor.description: TOTP and WebAuthn/Passkeys support for enhanced security. Includes backup codes, rate limiting, and audit logging.
two_factor.author: FastAPI Blocks Registry
features: WebAuthn/Passkeys support (YubiKey, Touch ID, Face ID, etc.)
Per-user rate limiting and account lockout
Encrypted TOTP secrets and WebAuthn keys
two_factor.notes: IMPORTANT: WebAuthn requires HTTPS in production (localhost exempt for dev). Update auth/dependencies.py to use AuthServiceWith2FA for 2FA integration. See README.md for integration guide.
